website_summaries.verdict: Easily combat dull-looking skin with this revitalizing moisturizer.
pros: Though this moisturizer is marketed specifically to men, anyone can benefit from its energizing properties
It contains caffeine and vitamin E to brighten and moisturize without leaving skin looking oily or shiny
cons: Some customers wish that this has exfoliating properties

customer_reviews.title: My favorite moisturizer for my face, neck and the back of my neck..
customer_reviews.text: So balanced and works great if you have a beard. I love this moisturizer because it works and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Davirgi

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and arrived quickly in perfect condition. I use Facial Fuel as an after shave and I love the result. Moisturizes and soothes my face and seems to smooth my crows feet. Price was excellent and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as an aftershave, highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a aftershave. Works great. Soothes any abrasions or cuts and I never have breakouts. Face feels smooth all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer for men!
customer_reviews.text: Best moisture treatment for a man on the go. No sticky residue, no hassle and great smell!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Best facial lotion
customer_reviews.text: My go to lotion when face is dry. I’ve been using this for almost 10 years and haven’t found anything better for my face. Not greasy and love the cooling feel when I first put it on.
customer_reviews.author: JGSchool

customer_reviews.title: Size of a pea covers whole face, worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is so moisturizing and smells very pleasant and not too strong of scent. It only takes the size of a pea to cover face so it’s worth the price. Good ingredients, good company. Always a gift that’s appreciated and loved!
customer_reviews.author: SAHM Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product... You pay for it a little upfront. But the product works feels great. A tiny dab goes a very long way. For me this will probably last almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn D.

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I'm a big fan of the refreshing sensation produced by the caffeine and menthol on my face. I don't think I could pick another product over this line for washing my face and moisturizing it, and I'll admit the sensation is a big part of why.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé used this stuff daily. I tried it & have been hooked ever since! Very refreshing
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Lewis

customer_reviews.title: this is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: My husband works outside and was concerned about his skin. Since getting this for him there has been noticeable improvement in his skin. He looks refreshed and younger. We will be buying this again (and again)
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Company has a great reputation, good products.
customer_reviews.text: This company has always had great products, never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Don Coker

customer_reviews.title: NOT ENERGIZING SCRUB
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the energizing scrub. I wish they had the scrub in this size.
customer_reviews.author: Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Only the best in the business
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and has improved my skin so much
customer_reviews.author: Paul Escamilla

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I use.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for yrs! Perfect for the active guy - no fuss moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Francis L. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Gets “Dude Stamp of Approval” helping avoid dryness, wrinkles etc
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 50 year old dude that has been using this for years as my ex wife raves about it. I despise dry skin feeling and love this stuff. I’m not really into the metro sexual thing, but this stuff helps keep your skin from feeling dry, itchy etc especially after shave, sun burn etc. gets dude stamp of approval.
customer_reviews.author: brian s

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: For years my wife has been nagging me to use nightly moisturizer. Having never used one I really don’t anything to compare this facial fuel to. All I k ow is the first time ever, my face feels so smooth and so much better. This is truly a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: The recipient likes it
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this myself, but the recipient liked the first one enough to ask for another -- this is a reorder. So, must be five stars...
customer_reviews.author: Doofus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daily use
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It's not greasy, keeps your skin moisturized, and smells great. Definitely on the pricier side, but worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: The product is non-greasy, leaves you refreshing with a touch of mint; good hydration and a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Louis G. Payor

customer_reviews.title: Money is not important for it
customer_reviews.text: Whatever expensive or not, I need this for 10 years
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ray

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Great smell and feel, clearly quality ingredients, excellent brand. CONS: Feels a little gross on your palms after using and needs to be washed off, fades quickly and skin goes back to dry. Crazy expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Satchitananda

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but at nearly $61 on Amazon, it's way overpriced. It's $43 at Neiman Marcus.
customer_reviews.author: ABQreviewer

customer_reviews.title: The benchmark for Moisturizers
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best moisturizer I’ve ever used, nothing has come close. This is the benchmark I use for other moisturizers and even then I just come back to this one. Some notes: -no greasy residue -scent is extremely minimal and very neutral -works great on oily skin -infused with some vitamin C to help your skin complexion glow Highly recommend this moisturizer as a daily driver for anyone out there but don’t use kiehls spf moisturizer, that one has dried out my skin more than it has helped. Much better off using this as a moisturizer and a separate SPF on top of this.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

product_meta.title: Facial Fuel Energizing Moisture Treatment For Men 6.8 oz/200ml
product_meta.description: Refuel, re-energize, revitalize and moisturize! Vitamin-enriched and energizing non-oily moisturizer wakens and uplifts dull, fatigued skin. This facial recovery accelerator helps skin resist the affects of environmental stress for a healthy, invigorated appearance. Skin will feel refueled, re-energized and revitalized! 6.8 oz. - Vitamin-enriched and energizing non-oily moisturizer wakens and uplifts dull, fatigued skin. - This "facial recovery accelerator" helps skin resist the affects of environmental stress for a healthy, invigorated appearance. - Skin will feel refueled, re-energized and revitalized.
feature_bullets: Facial Fuel Energizing Moisture Treatment For Men 6.8 oz
